verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%> Apostle, <S%G652><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Raised <S%G1453><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galatia. <S%G1053><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Our Sins, <S%G2257><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> He Might Deliver <S%G1807><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Present <S%G1764><s%> Age <S%G165><s%> Evil, <S%G4190><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Our; <S%G2257><s%>
To Whom Be <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

I Wonder <S%G2296><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Quickly <S%G5030><s%> Ye Are Being Changed <S%G3346><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Christ's, <S%G5547><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Different <S%G2087><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Another; <S%G243><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Trouble <S%G5015><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Desire <S%G2309><s%> To Pervert <S%G3344><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ : <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Should Announce Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> ' Contrary To <S%G3844><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> We Announced <S%G2097><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Accursed <S%G331><s%> Let Him Be. <S%G2077><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> We Have Said Before, <S%G4280><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> To You <S%G5209><s%> Announces Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> ' Contrary To <S%G3844><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ye Received, <S%G3880><s%> Accursed <S%G331><s%> Let Him Be. <S%G2077><s%>

<S%G737><s%> For Now <S%G1063><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Do I Persuade <S%G3982><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Do I Seek <S%G2212><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> To Please? <S%G700><s%> <S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> I Were Pleasing, <S%G700><s%> Christ's <S%G5547><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G302><s%> I Should Not Be. <S%G2252><s%>

I Make Known <S%G1107><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Announced <S%G2097><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not <S%G2076><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I 1473 P-1NS From 3844 PREP Man 444 N-GSM Received 3880 V-2AAI-1S It, 846 P-ASN Nor 3777 CONJ Was I Taught It, 1321 V-API-1S But 235 CONJ ' By 1223 PREP A Revelation 602 N-GSF Of Jesus 2424 N-GSM Christ. 5547 N-GSM

<S%G191><s%> For Ye Heard Of <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1699><s%> My Conduct <S%G391><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judaism, <S%G2454><s%> <S%G3754><s%> ' That <S%G2596><s%> Excessively <S%G5236><s%> I Was Persecuting <S%G1377><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Ravaging <S%G4199><s%> It; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Advancing <S%G4298><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judaism <S%G2454><s%> Beyond <S%G5228><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Contemporaries <S%G4915><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1085><s%> My Own Race, <S%G3450><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4056><s%> Zealous <S%G2207><s%> Being <S%G5225><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Fathers <S%G3967><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> For The Traditions. <S%G3862><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Was Pleased <S%G2106><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Selected <S%G873><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Womb <S%G2836><s%> <S%G3384><s%> My Mother's <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Me By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5485><s%> His Grace, <S%G846><s%>

To Reveal <S%G601><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G2097><s%> I Should Announce Him As The Glad Tidings <S%G846><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Conferred Not <S%G4323><s%> With Flesh <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> Went I Up <S%G424><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Those Who Were <S%G3588><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Apostles, <S%G652><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> I Went Away <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Arabia, <S%G688><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> I Went Up <S%G424><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> To Make Acquaintance With <S%G2477><s%>, Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Remained <S%G1961><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Fifteen; <S%G1178><s%>

<S%G2087><s%> But Other <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Saw Not <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Then <S%G1899><s%> I Came <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Regions <S%G2824><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Syria <S%G4947><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Cilicia; <S%G2791><s%>

<S%G2252><s%> But I Was <S%G1161><s%> Unknown <S%G50><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Face <S%G4383><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea <S%G2449><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Are In <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G3440><s%> Only <S%G1161><s%> Hearing <S%G191><s%> They Were, <S%G2258><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Persecuted <S%G1377><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Once, <S%G4218><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Announces The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> He Ravaged : <S%G4199><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Glorifying <S%G1392><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
